title: I want to know!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Umi-chan, aren’t you tired? Should I massage your shoulders?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….What’s up all of a sudden, Hanayo?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe, I just wanted to show my gratitude towards Umi-chan who has made many wonderful lyrics for μ’s time after time~♪ The~re, The~re….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….You’re too naive. You’re tempting me to try and take this notebook away right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeh!? H-, how did you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s written in your face<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Come on~. I want to see the lyrics before they’re completed. If I know what kinds of words you’re not sure about, I think I can get a better understanding of the meaning behind Umi-chan’s lyrics, so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Hanayo…. Are you really interested in my lyrics that much?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! I want to know more about the lyrics you’re making, Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….T- then you should say so from the start. I’ll explain it until you understand, Hanayo<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
